page.title: 02FARMING AND MARKET GARDENING
page.content:
There are two{farms}and one market garden in Newbold. Mr.Nicklinson has about 100 sheep, 4 horses,2 dogs,6 pigs,20 chickens. The farm machinery Mr.Nicklinson has are,2 tractors,3 trailers,1 bailer, 1 muck spreader,1 crop sprayer,and a plough.
The{crops}he grows are wheat,barley and oats.Mr.Nicklinson has 102 acres of land and 2 people work on the farm.The people's names who work on the farm are Jackie and Geoff.
On Mr.Brunt's{nursery}he grows lettuce, beans, parsnips, cabbages, Christmas trees, tomatoes and flowers. Mr.Brunt has 10 acres of land,2 people work there.He has 1 rotivator and 6 greenhouses.Mr.Brunt has 2 dogs,3 cats and 1 goat.
